edge: Rajkumar arrives in Dhartipur, a small town ruled by drug barons.
Shivraj and Manik Parmar are drug barons who control Dhartipur and have an arch-enemy relationship.
Ajit Taaka is a mafia boss who operates in Hong Kong and has influence over Dhartipur.
Chanda is an orphan being raised by Manik Parmar, who opposes her relationship with Rajkumar.
Shivraj sees Chanda emerging from water during a pooja ritual and lusts after her.
Rajkumar falls in love with Chanda, despite her uncle's opposition.
Shivraj compromises with Parmar to get Chanda married against her will.
Chanda challenges Shivraj to strip herself naked if he defeats Rajkumar in a challenge.
Rajkumar captures Shivraj's narcotic truck and drives it to Ajit Taaka.
Shivraj tries a lot to impress Chanda but keeps failing.
Ajit Takka is the recipient of Rajkumar's stolen truck, which he believes contains narcotics.
Rajkumar works for Ajit Taaka and was sent to Dhartipur to take over the drug cartel.
Shivraj plans to get Rajkumar killed in an encounter by his pet cop.
